vulnerable.commit_message:
gsocketclient: Fix criticals

This ensures the parent GTask is kept alive as long as an enumeration
is running and trying to connect.

Closes #1646
Closes #1649
vulnerable.cve_desc: gio/gsocketclient.c in GNOME GLib 2.59.2 does not ensure that a parent GTask remains alive during the execution of a connection-attempting enumeration, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (g_socket_client_connected_callback mishandling and application crash) via a crafted web site, as demonstrated by GNOME Web (aka Epiphany).
